resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82390</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82390</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Serial CLR circuit </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Serien-CLR Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit séquentiel de CLR</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito de série de CLR</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito seriale di CLR</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τμηματικό κύκλωμα CLR</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito serial de CLR</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Elements of the serial CLR circuit. If you mark a piece by mouse, its name is shown. It worths remembering the names of the elements, because these will be the answers in the quiz game</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elemente des Serien-CLR Stromkreises. Wenn 
Sie ein Stück durch Maus kennzeichnen, wird sein Name gezeigt. 
Es Werte, welche an die Namen der Elemente sich erinnern, weil 
diese die Antworten im Quizspiel sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éléments du circuit séquentiel de CLR. Si
vous marquez un morceau par la souris, son nom est montré. Il 
valeurs se rappelant les noms des éléments, parce que ce seront les 
réponses dans le jeu de jeu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elementos do circuito de série de CLR. Se 
você marcar uma parte pelo rato, seu nome está mostrado. Ele 
valores que recordam os nomes dos elementos, porque estas serão as 
respostas no jogo do quiz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elementi del circuito seriale di CLR. Se 
contrassegnate una parte dal mouse, il relativo nome è indicato. 
Esso valori che si ricordano dei nomi degli elementi, perché 
queste saranno le risposte nel gioco di quiz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία του τμηματικού κυκλώματος CLR. Εάν 
χαρακτηρίζετε ένα κομμάτι από το ποντίκι, το όνομά του 
εμφανίζεται. Αυτό αξία που θυμάται τα ονόματα των 
στοιχείων, επειδή αυτές θα είναι οι απαντήσεις στο παιχνίδι 
διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elementos del circuito serial de CLR. Si 
usted marca un pedazo por el ratón, se muestra su nombre. Él 
valores que recuerdan los nombres de los elementos, porque éstas 
serán las respuestas en el juego del concurso</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:;Sulinet
FN:Sulinet
ORG:Sulinet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:;Sulinet
FN:Sulinet
ORG:Sulinet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>4846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>creator</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Hunya;Márta;;;
FN:Márta Hunya
ORG:
END:VCARD</entity>
            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:;European Schoolnet
FN:European Schoolnet
ORG:European Schoolnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>drill and practice</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>1143</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">sciences</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>

                <string language="en">physics</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>

    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>82390</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
